Description.val: Mortar Systems includes the production of 60mm Light Weight M224/A1; 81mm Light Weight M252/A1; and 120mm M120A1/M121 Mortar Weapon Systems and includes production of associated equipment to include procurement of the M326 Mortar Stowage Kit and M1101 trailer that are used with the M120A1 120mm towed mortar system.  The Mortar Stowage Kit system enables rapid emplacement and displacement of the M120A1 from the M1101 Trailer.

Justification.val: FY 2014 Base procurement dollars in the amount of $5.310 million supports the procurement of 132 60mm Direct Lay Sights (DLS), 20 M1101 Trailers and 650 Round Counters and production support costs for production, staging, and new equipment training.  These systems support requirements for lightweight 60mm and 81mm mortars for Infantry and Stryker Brigade Combat team and Special Forces.
